dap

Class Patrons

  • java.lang.Object
    • dap.Patrons

  • public class Patrons
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create new Patron objects, get their data, remove them from patronsMap, and update their values.

        firstName - The patron's firstName
        lastName - The patron's last name.
        email - The patron's email address.
        phoneNumber - The patron's phone number.
        address - The patron's address.
        city - The patron's city. *
        state - The patron's state.
        zipCode - The patron's zip code.

        Checks if the passed in patron has any items checked out.
        Parameters:
